/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's view of the surroundings. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. On the right side of the road, there are buildings visible, indicating a residential or commercial area. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene. The colors in the image are predominantly green and gray, reflecting the natural and man-made elements of the landscape.
